Welcome to the FBK International PhD Program
It's Nice To Meet You
Tell Me More

What

Three reasons to be a PhD student in FBK :)

Laboratories

FBK-ICT offers a unique stimulating and exciting environment to its PhD students. PhD students supervised by FBK-ICT researchers conduct their work in the lab of the research units, in strict collaboration with the units’ teams and under the supervision of top-ranked researchers, targeting the highest scientific and publication standards.

International network

The FBK-ICT PhD program involves more than 60 PhD Students allocated to the units of the three Research Lines and of the three High Impact Initiatives of the center. The PhD program is carried out in collaboration with prestigious national and international Affiliated universities.

Promoting excellence

Most Alumni of the FBK-ICT PhD program have an exceptionally strong publication and citation record. After their PhD, some of them have been enrolled in prestigious institutions, as the University of Luxembourg and the University of Colorado at Boulder.

OUR CENTERS

The excellence in FBK

ICT

Center for Communication and Information Technology

CMM

Center for Materials & Microsystems

ISR

Center for Religious studies

Alumni

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.

  • 2009-2011

    Alfio Gliozzo: Research Manager, Knowledge Induction @ IBM Research

    Alfio Gliozzo has 16 years of research and development experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence, with strong focus on Natural Language Processing and Semantic Web. He is currently managing the Knowledge Induction department at IBM T.J. Watson Research and teaching Cognitive Computing at Columbia University. He was part of the Deep QA team that developed Jeopardy! system.
